Class LoanController

public class LoanController
extends java.lang.Object
    Loan controller which handles all loans functionality

      • showLoans

        @RequestMapping(value="/showLoans")
public java.lang.String showLoans(org.springframework.ui.Model m)
        Gets ArrayList of Loans from service, and adds to model to be displayed in view when /showLoans page is loaded
        Parameters:
        m - Model which is used to add list of loans to jsp view
        Returns:
        string of .jsp page to be loaded
        See Also:
        LoanService

      • addNewLoan

        @RequestMapping(value="/newLoan",
                method=GET)
public java.lang.String addNewLoan(@ModelAttribute(value="loan")
                                                                                                   Loan loan)
        Get and display newLoan when navigated to, this page allows the user to add a new loan
        Parameters:
        loan - Loan model which is the object bound to the form, and is used to get data from the form
        Returns:
        string of .jsp page to be loaded

      • newLoanAdded

        @RequestMapping(value="/newLoan",
                method=POST)
public java.lang.String newLoanAdded(@ModelAttribute(value="loan")
                                                                                                      Loan loan,
                                                                                                      org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result,
                                                                                                      org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        Post request which is called on submit of form, also errors are handled by displaying error pages if encountered.
        Parameters:
        loan - (Loan) model which is the object bound to the form, and is used to get data from the form
        result - Used in validation of form inputs, e.g displays error message if fields are empty.
        Returns:
        string of .jsp page to be loaded using redirect so if page is refreshed it won't call add method again.
        See Also:
        LoanService

      • deleteLoan

        @RequestMapping(value="/deleteLoan",
                method=GET)
public java.lang.String deleteLoan(@ModelAttribute(value="loan")
                                                                                                      Loan loan)
        Get and display deleteLoan when navigated to, this page allows the user to delete a loan using the loan id
        Parameters:
        loan - (Loan) model which is the object bound to the form, and is used to get data from the form
        Returns:
        string of .jsp page to be loaded.
        See Also:
        LoanService

      • deletedLoan

        @RequestMapping(value="/deleteLoan",
                method=POST)
public java.lang.String deletedLoan(@ModelAttribute(value="loan")
                                                                                                        Loan loan,
                                                                                                        org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        Post request which is called on submit of form, also errors are handled by displaying error page if encountered. Deletion of loan is handled here.
        Parameters:
        loan - (Loan) model which is the object bound to the form, and is used to get data from the form
        m - Model which is used to add old book data to jsp view
        Returns:
        string of .jsp page to be loaded using redirect so if page is refreshed it won't call add method again.
        See Also:
        LoanService
